test-rule-699bdfa5.name: Test S3 Bucket Security Rule
test-rule-699bdfa5.description: Test rule to ensure S3 buckets have proper encryption
test-rule-699bdfa5.remediation: Enable S3 bucket encryption by adding server_side_encryption_configuration block

api-test-rule-9e33b1aa.name: API Test S3 Encryption Rule
api-test-rule-9e33b1aa.description: Test rule for API workflow - ensures S3 buckets have encryption
api-test-rule-9e33b1aa.remediation: Add server_side_encryption_configuration block to S3 bucket

test-candidate-5683c427.name: S3 Bucket Encryption Required
test-candidate-5683c427.description: Ensures all S3 buckets have server-side encryption enabled
test-candidate-5683c427.remediation: Add server_side_encryption_configuration block with AES256 or aws:kms encryption

test-candidate-e31e1ed5.name: Security Group SSH Access Restriction
test-candidate-e31e1ed5.description: Prevents security groups from allowing SSH access from 0.0.0.0/0
test-candidate-e31e1ed5.remediation: Restrict SSH access to specific IP ranges instead of 0.0.0.0/0

test-candidate-404f513a.name: RDS Instance Backup Retention
test-candidate-404f513a.description: Ensures RDS instances have adequate backup retention period
test-candidate-404f513a.remediation: Set backup_retention_period to at least 7 days

test-candidate-68bc6eff.name: IAM Policy Wildcard Prevention
test-candidate-68bc6eff.description: Prevents IAM policies from using wildcard (*) permissions
test-candidate-68bc6eff.remediation: Replace wildcard permissions with specific actions

test-candidate-577d14c7.name: CloudTrail Logging Enabled
test-candidate-577d14c7.description: Ensures CloudTrail logging is enabled for audit purposes
test-candidate-577d14c7.remediation: Enable CloudTrail with proper S3 bucket configuration

86a4d525-b319-4c37-9f0f-3132e80b81fb.name: ML-Generated Suspicious IP Detection
86a4d525-b319-4c37-9f0f-3132e80b81fb.description: Detect suspicious IP activity based on ML analysis
86a4d525-b319-4c37-9f0f-3132e80b81fb.remediation: Review IP access patterns and implement IP allowlisting

56dba3fc-fe12-4943-9c3e-a5070b40fd9a.name: ML-Generated Suspicious IP Detection
56dba3fc-fe12-4943-9c3e-a5070b40fd9a.description: Detect suspicious IP activity based on ML analysis
56dba3fc-fe12-4943-9c3e-a5070b40fd9a.remediation: Review IP access patterns and implement IP allowlisting
